name: Liberty Finance
description: Liberty Finance (LibFi) is a compliant and innovative decentralized finance (DeFi) ecosystem that leverages advanced DeFAI technologies and ethical financial practices to redefine digital lending. Structured as a decentralized autonomous organization (DAO), LibFi bridges the gap between traditional finance (TradFi) and decentralized finance by offering secure, scalable, and community-driven financial solutions. At its core, LibFi operates through four specialized financial engines: - Digital Lending Engine (LendWide): The worldâ€™s first liquidation-proof DeFi lending protocol, utilizing DeFAI-driven risk management to protect borrowers from market volatility. - Commodity Lending Engine (IFaaS): An onchain B2B solution transforming compliant RWA lending for financial institutions with AI-driven efficiency and streamlined Tawarruq processes. - Microfunding Engine (Firoza Finance): A compliant microfunding platform that connects investors and borrowers via customizable, low-risk investment opportunities powered by DeFAI-based risk assessments. - Trading Engine (LibFi DEX): A decentralized exchange fostering inclusive, transparent, and ethical trading within the DeFi ecosystem. Together, these engines empower users with advanced financial tools while fostering financial inclusion, literacy, sustainability, and accessibility across diverse markets.
